sense.name: bring about, complete, carry out
sense.examples: She fulfilled the clinical criteria of MELAS. He fulfilled all of our expectations and exceeded some. Has outsourcing fulfilled its promise? The prophecy was fulfilled when he returned by sea with the amulet. She tells how she fulfilled her dream of leaving migrant field work. He fulfills his production assignments by 125-130 percent. They fulfilled their obligation by building a shrine. I will fulfill your every desire. He hasn't fulfilled the college foreign language requirement.
